title: how to be good at art
body:
practise.
there is no such thing as natural talent, i myself is quite a good artist and i was born with something that makes it so my hands are weak and somewhat hard to control but i practised hard and eventually came the best artist in my primary school

replies.body:
There is something called natural talent, and having talents do make a big difference in the end.

However it's just that, art is not something that has a "top" hence having talents or not isn't as drastically different like in the field of say, engineering or simply, sports.

So yes, practice is a good idea.

But still, the most important thing is creativity.
